changeSet.sql: -- Create table CREATE TABLE APPS.ITSM_FILE_INTERFACE ( ID NUMBER NOT NULL, FILE_NAME VARCHAR2(300 CHAR) NOT NULL, FILE_TYPE VARCHAR2(20 CHAR), FILE_SIZE NUMBER, FILE_CONTENT BLOB NOT NULL, CREATE_DATE TIMESTAMP(6), LAST_UPDATE_DATE TIMESTAMP(6), SERVICE_INTERFACE_ID NUMBER NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PK_ITSM_FILE_INTERFACE PRIMARY KEY (ID) USING INDEX STORAGE ( INITIAL 64K NEXT 1M MAXEXTENTS UNLIMITED )) STORAGE ( INITIAL 64K NEXT 1M MAXEXTENTS UNLIMITED ) LOGGING;

changeSet.author: conor
conor
conor
conor
conor
conor
changeSet.sql:
-- Create table CREATE TABLE APPS.CALC_DISTR_ENTITY_TYPES ( CODE VARCHAR2(30 CHAR) NOT NULL, CREATE_BY NUMBER, CREATE_DATE TIMESTAMP(6), LAST_UPDATE_BY NUMBER, LAST_UPDATE_DATE TIMESTAMP(6), CONSTRAINT PK_CALC_DISTR_ENTITY_TYPES PRIMARY KEY (CODE)) STORAGE ( INITIAL 64K MAXEXTENTS UNLIMITED ) LOGGING;
-- Add comments to the table COMMENT ON TABLE APPS.CALC_DISTR_ENTITY_TYPES IS 'Типы сущностей в распределении электроэнергии';

changeSet.author: conor
changeSet.sql:
-- Create table CREATE TABLE APPS.CALC_DISTR_ENTITY_TYPES_TL ( CODE VARCHAR2(30 CHAR) NOT NULL, LANG VARCHAR2(10 CHAR) NOT NULL, SHORT_NAME VARCHAR2(30 CHAR) NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR2(100 CHAR) NOT NULL, CREATE_BY NUMBER, CREATE_DATE TIMESTAMP(6), LAST_UPDATE_BY NUMBER, LAST_UPDATE_DATE TIMESTAMP(6), CONSTRAINT PK_CALC_DISTR_ENTITY_TYPES_TL PRIMARY KEY (CODE, LANG)) STORAGE ( INITIAL 64K MAXEXTENTS UNLIMITED ) LOGGING;
-- Add comments to the table COMMENT ON TABLE APPS.CALC_DISTR_ENTITY_TYPES_TL IS 'Переводы наименований типов сущностей в распределении электроэнергии';

-- Create/Recreate indexes create bitmap index APPS.IDX_CALC_DISTRIBUTION_DEPENDENCIES_N1 on APPS.CALC_DISTRIBUTION_DEPENDENCIES (SOURCE_DOC_ID) tablespace SYSTEM pctfree 10 initrans 2 maxtrans 255 storage ( initial 64K next 1M minextents 1 maxextents unlimited );
create bitmap index APPS.IDX_CALC_DISTRIBUTION_DEPENDENCIES_N2 on APPS.CALC_DISTRIBUTION_DEPENDENCIES (TARGET_DOC_ID) tablespace SYSTEM pctfree 10 initrans 2 maxtrans 255 storage ( initial 64K next 1M minextents 1 maxextents unlimited );
